title: letter_to_gao_foia
abstract:
March 17, 2008
Mr. Timothy P. Bowling
Chief Quality Officer
Government Accountability Office
Washington, DC 20548
 
 
Ref. PRI-08-081
Dear Mr. Bowling:
I would like to thank you for your very prompt and very complete answer to my request 
for records pertaining to the federal legislative histories contract with Thomson West 
Publishing Corporation.
Pursuant to the regulations concerning the availability of GAO records to the public as 
outlined in 4 C.F.R. Part 81 (2007), I am requesting copies
